excerpt: "For Q3 2023, ServiceNow reported $2.28 billion in revenue, a 27% increase from a year-ago quarter, beating the Street consensus of $2.274 billion. The company’s earnings per share (EPS) increased to $2.92, 49% up from $1.96 a year ago. ServiceNow’s subscription revenue increased 24.5% year-over-year to $2.216 in the latest Q3 earnings report."
